name: Strokes Of The Past
description:
Submission for the Game Jam+ 2021

= Summary =

"Strokes of the Past" is a game that aims to immerse players in a world viewed from the perspective of an aged artist who has forgotten his ways. Players will accompany the artist on his journey of rediscovery and will partake in reliving his cherished memories that resurface as the game goes on.

= Theme Used =

"Make me cry"

= TEAM CREDITS =

Developed entirely by Costa Rican folk

Programmers:

  • Anthony Achoy
  • Carlos Roberto Esquivel

Artists:

  • Mariana Navarro
  • Emilio Vargas

Sound:

  • Juan Diego Bejarano

Story Writer:

  • Kenichi Hayakawa
